item.title: Git/Github fork-pull request-update cycle
item.description: When contributing to Open Source Projects, new contributors often run into problems of having multiple merge commits and issues with keeping the forked repo in sync. This post addresses solutions for some of the problems.

item.description: In this simple tutorial I will show how to maintain multiple git emails on a same machine. And how to configure git emails per directory or per project.

item.title: An exploit on Gaana.com gave me access to their entire User Database
item.description: In May, 2015 I found an exploit on Gaana.com, which let me access their entire User Database (more than 10 Million) which included all the user info.
